topics.body:
So one of the people I follow on Tumblr said he tried Reporting one of the Shop lifting people on Tumblr because they admitted to stealing shit and this is what he got back apparently.

“ We realize this content may be very upsetting, but we also highly value freedom of expression and freedom of speech. And, while a given activity may be illegal, content showing such an activity is generally not illegal. This is how news reports and documentaries are able to show illegal activity, for example. “
